snippet: In 15 years of research on Nelson A. Rockefeller, Richard Norton Smith says he came to see him as an impetuous dreamer who also wanted circumstances very much under his control.
abstract: Author Richard Norton Smith has been enamored with Nelson A Rockefeller since first meeting him at age 14; his book On His Own Terms: A Life of Nelson Rockefeller is set for release by Random House after 14 years of work.
lead_paragraph: In 15 years of research on Nelson A. Rockefeller, Richard Norton Smith says he came to see him as an impetuous dreamer who also wanted circumstances very much under his control.

headline.seo: Richard Norton Smith Dissects Nelson Rockefeller
headline.main: Capturing the Life of a Striver Who Fell Short of the White House
headline.print_headline: Capturing the Life of a Striver Who Fell Short of the White House

keywords.value: On His Own Terms: A Life of Nelson Rockefeller (Book)
keywords.name: creative_works
